title: Hong Kong brings World Cultures Festival with tantalising Tango - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hong Kong brings World Cultures Festival with tantalising Tango Published on : Saturday, October 10, 2015
The Leisure & Cultural Services Department’s of Hong Kong brings World Cultures Festival that will open with Tango Buenos Aires’ The Song of Eva Peron from October 16 to 18 at the Cultural Centre.
Choreographed by Hector Falcon, the performance charts the life of the former Argentinian first lady through new and traditional choreography. Tantalising tango the Song of Eva Peron includes a phenomenal rendition of an Argentinian boleadoras folk dance.
There will also be live band and vocal performances of original works including Matos Rodriguez’s La Cumparsita and Astor Piazzolla’s Oblivion.
